name: Biomes (l'Observatoire, Kedzo, Asakim The Mist Warden, Bls691, Ønym)
name_original: Biomes (l'Observatoire, Kedzo, Asakim The Mist Warden, Bls691, Ønym)
description:
Build your world by placing environments and watch the sensational reactions they produce between them!

In Biomes, the world evolves through its environments, which expand or create new environments. You have the tools to place, remove or replace them.

Team:

Quentin "Asakim" Gautier : Art Direction, 3D & 2D Production

Mathis "Bls" Negny : Programming, 3D Production

Tristan "Kedzo" Lecorre : Programming

Ønym : Programming, Sound Design

Find the soundtrack Here

Audio engine : FMOD studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd
